bibl.title: Vindolanda. Extraordinary Records of Daily Life on the Northern Frontier.
bibl.note: Concentrates upon the inscribed or written material.
BIRLEY Robin, Vindolanda. Extraordinary Records of Daily Life on the Northern Frontier.
Greenhead, Northumberland, Roman Army Museum Publications - Vindolanda Trust, 2003, 8°, 112 pp., 75 figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 1-873136-97-8. £10.95.
